channel.title: politics on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in politics on PepsFeeder

item.title: South Korean officials: There is no indication that Kim Jong-un is experiencing physical problems
item.description: According to a media report on Tuesday (April 21), North Korean leader Kim Jong-un was seriously ill, leading to a sharp depreciation of South Korean currency and the South Korean stock market.

item.title: Pete Buttigieg Dropped Out and It's Reshaping the Race
item.description: The once-enormous Democratic presidential primary field has suddenly gotten quite small Pete Buttigieg always thought a step ahead. With reporters, the former South Bend, Indiana mayor was deliberate in every word he spoke.

item.title: Bernie Sanders Gets New Boost From Ex-Rival
item.description: Bernie Sanders just got a high-profile endorsement from one of his former rivals for the Oval Office New York City Mayor Bill DeBlasio who dropped out of the presidential race himself in September gave the Vermont senator the thumbs-up on Friday which the New York Times notes is the opposite of what he did in 2016 when he endorsed Hillary Clinton over Sanders.
